name: BotFightHero
description:
Play the hero fighting against different enemies in this free Third Person Shooter (TPS).

Features

  • Enemies: Patrol Red Shotgun, Patrol Green Rifle, Guard Blue Rifle, Guard Black Sniper, Guard Yellow Pistol.
  • Weapons: Knife, Pistol, Assault Rifle, Sniper Rifle, Shotgun, Grenade Launcher, Rocket Launcher
  • Maps: Lobby, Level 1-2
  • Input: Keyboard
  • Frames per Second (FPS) counter to check your PC’s performance.

I made BotFightHero using Unreal Engine 4 (UE4).

Check out BradAppList to see more of my apps and BradCodeTips to see how I make games.

You have my permission to play or review BotFightHero on a website (Twitch, YouTube, etc.).
